Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio

Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class representing wrapper for AS_Audio.

Public Types

      FadeIn = AS_Audio::Effect_FadeIn,

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::TrackProperty

Enumeration specifying Audio-specific properties that may be set for creation.

Enumerator:
TrackPregapSize  IN/OUT: Integer Pregap size
TrackIndices  IN/OUT: Integer track indices
TrackISRC  IN/OUT: Byte[] 12 byte ISRC (L to R: 0-1 Country, 2-4 Registrant, 5-6 Year, 7-11 Designation)
Track_Title  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Title
Track_Performer  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Performer
Track_Songwriter  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Songwriter
Track_Composer  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Composer
Track_Arranger  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Arranger
Track_Message  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Message
Track_Genre  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Genre
Track_GenreCode  IN/OUT: String CD-Text Genre Code

enum Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::FileType

Enumeration specifying Supported audio file types.

Enumerator:
AutoDetect  Auto-detect the file type based on the file extension.
PCM  PCM is not detected. Not available for streamed data. Raw audio (CD-DA), audio-CD creation only
WAV  Creation/Extraction.
MP3  Audio-CD creation only. Extract to file (when enabled).
WMA  Audio-CD creation only.
M4A  Audio-CD creation only.

Member Function Documentation

System::Int32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::AddAudioTrackFromFile ( String^   fullPath,
FileType  fileType,
[Out] System::UInt32%   track 
)

DESCRIPTION: Add an audio track to media from a file. Returns the one-based track number representing the file in the 'track' parameter.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parameters:
[in] fullPath - full path
[in] fileType - source (file) format
[out] track - track index reported back, 1 = first track
Returns:

StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

System::Int32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::AddAudioTrackFromStream ( System::UInt64  streamLength,
Volume::StreamCallback^   callback,
System::IntPtr  callerUse,
FileType  dataType,
[Out] System::UInt32%   track 
)

DESCRIPTION: Add an audio track to media from a stream. Returns the one-based track number representing the file in the 'track' parameter.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

The AS_Format_Audio_FileType must be specified for stream data. The AS_Audio_AutoDetect flag is not supported. Currently only AS_Audio_PCM is supported.

Parameters:
[in] streamLength - size of stream (and ultimately file on media)
[in] callback - stream callback function for track data
[in] callerUse - stream callback userdata
[in] dataType - source (stream data) format, AS_Audio_AutoDetect not supported
[out] track - track index reported back, 1 = first track
Returns:

StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

System::Int32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::SetAudioTrackProperty ( TrackProperty  prop,
System::UInt32  trackNumber,
System::UInt32  propSize,
System::Object^   propData,
System::UInt32  extPropIndex,
System::UInt32  extPropSize,
System::IntPtr  extPropData 
)

DESCRIPTION: Set a TrackProperty for the given track number.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parameters:
[in] prop - audio property to set
[in] trackNumber - track number, 1 = first track
[in] propSize - number of items in Object array for propData
[in] propData - list of items to set
[in] extPropIndex - reserved - index of extended property to return
[in] extPropSize - reserved - size available in extPropData buffer
[in] extPropData - buffer to copy extended property value into
Returns:

StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

System::Int32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::AddAudioTrackEffect ( System::UInt32  trackNumber,
EffectType  type,
System::UInt32  parametersSize,
array< System::UInt32^ >^  parameters 
)

Add an AS_Format_Audio_EffectType effect to the specified track number.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parameters:
[in] trackNumber - track number to add the effect to, 1 = first track
[in] type - type of effect, i.e. Normalize
[in] parametersSize - size of the 'parameters' buffer
[in] parameters - optional parameters for the specified effect type
Returns:

StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

System::Int32 Sonic::ManagedStorage::Audio::ExtractAudioTrackToFile ( System::UInt32  trackNumber,
String^   fullPath,
System::UInt32  flags,
System::Int32  startOffset,
System::Int32  length,
TrackTags^   tags,
TrackEncoderSettings^   encode,
Volume::InfoCallback^   callback,
System::IntPtr  callerUse,
array< int >^  reserved 
)

DESCRIPTION: Extracts a track from the audio CD to a file with the given path.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parameters:
[in] trackNumber - track number, 1 = first track
[in] fullPath - the full path of the file
[in] flags - reserved (must be zero) - extraction flags
[in] startOffset - 0 = start address, not including pregap
[in] length - -1 for entire track
[in] tags - optional file tags, ignored for WAV output
[in] encode - encoding settings
[in] callback - progress callback function
[in] callerUse - client callback parameter
[out] reserved - reserved, must be NULL
Returns:

StorageError.None - ok

StorageError.InvalidParameter - if track number does not exist

  • if the specified path is not valid
  • if the flags are incorrect
  • if the startOffset and/or length exceed the length of the track
